Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma, the Indian captain, was well cognisant of the expectations.
He stressed that he would like to keep it ‘nice and easy’, ‘nice and relaxed and calm’, ‘nice and balanced’.
Australian captain Pat Cummins was asked: ‘A hundred thousand people wanting you to fail is probably something new?’
He replied, ‘I think you’ve got to embrace it’.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian cricket team’s undefeated run in the competition has escalated the frenzy.
Crowds have been waiting outside stadiums for hours after the matches finish to wave the players off.
Indian fans outside the stadium were watching the drone show rehearsal.
A light-and-laser spectacle is slated for a drinks interval at night.
Others: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has been criticized for their delays in releasing the itinerary and the subsequent ticket sagas.
Two busloads of Australians were spotted making a guided tour of the city, visiting spots such as the Gandhi Ashram.
